issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description

When animating the tab group in Base UI->Animate Tab Group if the button is pressed when the device is landscape the tab group is portrait during the animation and then turns to landscape afterwards.
*This only occurs on a iPhone, I am unable to make it happen on an iPad*

h5.Steps To Reproduce

1. Install KitchenSink to device
2. Hold the device in landscape and navigate to Base UI->Tab Groups
3. Tap Animate Tab Group

h5.Actual Result

The tab group goes portrait for the animation then changes to landscape

h5.Expected Result

The tab group should be landscape during the animation
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Base UI->Tab Groups Animate Tab Group uses the incorrect orientation when in landscape
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.10.1
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.4.1.201410281743
Titanium SDK build: 3.5.0.v20141217134117
Titanium CLI, build: 3.4.1
Alloy: 1.5.1
Xcode 6.1.1
iPhone 6 Plus (8.1)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
